title: Can't see jungle camp icons and can't disable chat filter
body: Every time I get into a game to can't see the icons that indicate a jungle camp is alive like the "arrow" thing. This includes dragon and baron. Also i cannot disable the chat filter so it is still censored I have tried initiate full repair but it still won't fix

replies.body: But the filter is now off thank you
I still can't see the icons even after the hextech thing

It sounds like you may have some corrupt game data after the update that can't load up these assets properly.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and run a clean reinstall to get that fixed up.  

The language filter might not be toggling as a result of corrupt modifications, so your settings aren't processing.  Resetting your config should fix it up:
Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

Keep in mind that performing the HRT refresh shouldn't alter your config, so you'll have to perform the above process after.  Let me know if that does the trick for both issues.
